name: Heat Intensify
description:
Controls :

W - Move Up

A - Move Left

S - Move Down

D - Move Right

Shift - Run

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

Right Mouse Button - Refuel

- Holding Refuel while standing still will refuel faster

- Shooting while standing still will take more fuel but shoots longer

- Shooting while walking will take less fuel but shoots shorter

- Collect bandages to heal your health

- Kill as many zombies as you can
